name: Jigsaw puzzle x Bedtime Story
description:
Sometimes, the world is not quite right to you. Why don't take a break with this original Fairy tale? The story will entertain you with beautiful messages, graphics and effects. At some points, you will be challenged with small mini-games. And if you don't like the story, then you can rewrite the page! And, there are many jigsaws for you to play. It will be more fun when you play with your children, friends or family. If you like this app, please don't forget to rate it!

Mac Store:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/id1448118659
